scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run stylelint
scripts.pkg: npm run lint:utils && cd playground/publish/utils && NAME=utils webpack --config webpack.build.js
scripts.pkg:router: npm run lint:router && cd playground/publish && NAME=router webpack --config webpack.build.js
scripts.pkg:use: npm run lint:use && cd playground/publish && NAME=use webpack --config webpack.build.js
scripts.pkg:comp: npm run lint:comp && cd playground/publish && NAME=components webpack --config webpack.build.js
scripts.pkg:utils: npm run lint:utils && cd playground/publish/utils && NAME=utils webpack --config webpack.build.js
scripts.pkg:layout: npm run lint:layout && cd playground/publish && NAME=layout webpack --config webpack.build.js
scripts.pkg:css1: cd playground/src/styles && lessc --clean-css reset.less reset.min.less && mv reset.min.less ../../publish/dist/styles/lib/reset.less
scripts.pkg:css2: cd playground/src/styles && lessc --clean-css common.less common.min.less && mv common.min.less ../../publish/dist/styles/lib/common.less
scripts.pkg:styles: npm run pkg:css1 && npm run pkg:css2
scripts.publish: cd playground/publish/utils/utils && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:router: cd playground/publish/dist/router && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:use: cd playground/publish/dist/use && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:comp: cd playground/publish/dist/components && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:utils: cd playground/publish/utils/utils && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:layout: cd playground/publish/dist/layout && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:styles: cd playground/publish/dist/styles && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.pub: npm run pkg && npm run publish
scripts.pub:router: npm run pkg:router && npm run publish:router
scripts.pub:use: npm run pkg:use && npm run publish:use
scripts.pub:comp: npm run pkg:comp && npm run publish:comp
scripts.pub:utils: npm run pkg:utils && npm run publish:utils
scripts.pub:layout: npm run pkg:layout && npm run publish:layout
scripts.pub:styles: npm run pkg:styles && npm run publish:styles
scripts.pkg:vueRouter: npm run lint:vueRouter && cd playground/vue/publish && NAME=router webpack --config webpack.build-vue.js
scripts.pkg:vueUse: npm run lint:vueUse && cd playground/vue/publish && NAME=use webpack --config webpack.build-vue.js
scripts.publish:vueRouter: cd playground/vue/publish/dist/router && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:vueUse: cd playground/vue/publish/dist/use && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.pub:vueRouter: npm run pkg:vueRouter && npm run publish:vueRouter
scripts.pub:vueUse: npm run pkg:vueUse && npm run publish:vueUse
